definitions.definition: the flexible part of the dorsal body wall behind the rigid scutum in a hard tick , particularly a female — the alloscutum is the part of the body wall that must stretch to accommodate the blood that the tick swallows when it engorges in preparation for laying eggs.

main_definition: ( zoology ) the flexible part of the dorsal body wall behind the rigid scutum in a hard tick , particularly a female — the alloscutum is the part of the body wall that must stretch to accommodate the blood that the tick swallows when it engorges in preparation for laying eggs.
